text: Sled dog racing (sometimes termed dog sled racing or husky racing) is a winter sport most popular in the Arctic regions of Canada, Russia, the United States and some European countries."Dog Sled Races Around The World." Dogs. Terrificpets.com, Web. 9 Feb 2010. . It is a race of teams of sled dogs that pull a sled with the dog driver or musher standing on the runners. ==Related pages== *Iditarod *Finnmarksl√∏pet 2024 ==References== Category:Winter sports Category:Sports involving animals Category:Working dogs
title: Sled dog racing
